mapper.insert: insert into employee (name,sex,birthday,state, postid, userid, trainid, createtime) values (#{name},#{sex},#{birthday},#{state},#{postId},#{userId},#{trainId},#{createTime});
mapper.update: update employee set name=#{name},sex=#{sex},birthday=#{birthday}, state = #{state},postId=#{postId},userId=#{userId},trainId=#{trainId},createTime=#{createTime} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select * from employee where userid=#{userId} and state!=0;
select * from employee where postid=#{postId} limit #{1},#{2};
select * from employee where name like '${value}';
